name: Miami Flight Academy
about: Miami Flight Academy is a global network of FAA and JAA certified professional pilots and flight instructors, operating in Europe, America, Africa, and Asia. Our primary locations include Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport (KFXE) near Miami, Pontoise-Cormeilles (LFPT) near Paris, Hong Kong (VHHH), and Marrakech (GMMX). We specialize in accelerated training for all FAA certificates and ratings, and our teams are available for temporary instructor and pilot replacements worldwide. Our dedicated professionals are committed to guiding you from zero hours to a professional pilot career in as little as six months, ensuring you learn to fly safely and efficiently to secure your first job in the aviation industry. Our mission is to make your aviation career aspirations a reality.
